title: Bow-and-arrow attack in Norway appears to be terrorism; 5 people killed
content:
1. Bow-and-arrow attack in Norway appears to be terrorism; 5 people killed  NPR
  2. Five dead in Norway bow and arrow attack - BBC News  BBC News
  3. First Thing: Norway attack suspect ‘showed signs of radicalisation’  The Guardian
  4. Suspect charged after 5 killed in bow and arrow attack in Norway, police say  CNN
  5. Norway Bow-and-Arrow Attack Investigated as Terrorism as Police Say Suspect Was Reported for Radicalization  The Wall Street Journal
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
